meanings.sent1: The nematologists carefully observed the tiny nematodes under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Many nematologists work in laboratories to research different types of nematodes.
meanings.sent3: The nematologists joked that they were 'worm whisperers' because of their expertise.
meanings.sent4: In the world of soil creatures, nematologists are the detectives solving mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The nematologists' passion for nematodes was evident in their detailed studies.

meanings.definition: Nematologists: Those who specialize in the field of nematology.
meanings.sent1: A group of nematologists attended the international conference on nematology.
meanings.sent2: Nematologists often collaborate with botanists to understand plant-nematode interactions.
meanings.sent3: The nematologists organized a nematology-themed escape room for team-building.
meanings.sent4: To the nematologists, each nematode was a unique character in the soil story.
meanings.sent5: The nematologists' dedication to nematology inspired the next generation of scientists.
